00014 #ifndef fftH
00015 #define fftH
00016 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 #include "support.h"
00018 
00019 #include <vector>
00020 #include <complex>
00021 
00022 #include <fftw3.h>
00023 
00024 //! Wrapper class for fast Fourier transformation by FFTW.
00025 class FFTBase {
00026 public:
00027     FFTBase(int length);
00028     virtual ~FFTBase();
00029     //! Expand to appropriate length for better O(n log n) computation.
00030     static int fitLength(int length); 
00031     int length() const {return m_fftlen;}
00032 
00033     //for Window Func.
00034     typedef double (*twindowfunc)(double x);
00035     static double windowFuncRect(double x);
00036     static double windowFuncTri(double x);
00037     static double windowFuncHanning(double x);
00038     static double windowFuncHamming(double x);
00039     static double windowFuncFlatTop(double x);
00040     static double windowFuncBlackman(double x);
00041     static double windowFuncBlackmanHarris(double x);
00042     static double windowFuncKaiser(double x, double alpha);
00043     static double windowFuncKaiser1(double x);
00044     static double windowFuncKaiser2(double x);
00045     static double windowFuncKaiser3(double x);
00046     static double windowFuncFlatTopLong(double x);
00047     static double windowFuncFlatTopLongLong(double x);
00048     static double windowFuncHalfSin(double x);
00049 protected:
00050     int m_fftlen;
00051     shared_ptr<fftw_plan> m_fftplan;
00052 };
00053 
00054 //! Wrapper class for FFTW.
00055 class FFT : public FFTBase {
00056 public:
00057     //! Create FFT plan.
00058     //! \arg sign -1:FFT, 1:IFFT.
00059     //! \arg length FFT length.
00060     FFT(int sign, int length);
00061     virtual ~FFT();
00062 
00063     void exec(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& wavein,
00064         std::vector<std::complex<double> >& waveout);
00065 private:
00066     fftw_complex *m_pBufin, *m_pBufout;
00067 };
00068 
00069 //! Read Data FFT(DFT).
00070 class RFFT : public FFTBase {
00071 public:
00072     //! Create real data FFT plan.
00073     //! \arg length FFT length.
00074     RFFT(int length);
00075     virtual ~RFFT();
00076 
00077     void exec(const std::vector<double>& wavein,
00078         std::vector<std::complex<double> >& waveout);
00079 private:
00080     double *m_pBufin;
00081     fftw_complex *m_pBufout;
00082 };
00083 
00084 //! Read Data IFFT(IDFT).
00085 class RIFFT : public FFTBase {
00086 public:
00087     //! Create real data IFFT plan.
00088     //! \arg length FFT length.
00089     RIFFT(int length);
00090     virtual ~RIFFT();
00091 
00092     void exec(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& wavein,
00093         std::vector<double>& waveout);
00094 private:
00095     double *m_pBufout;
00096     fftw_complex *m_pBufin;
00097 };
00098 #endif
